languages.text: "Чтобы случилось сплетение, надо расширить сознание, видеть больше, слышать неслышимое. Следующие Завету Паутины воскуривают сакральные эссенции, и твое тело непривычно к ним, Домин'{name}. Разум пытается осознать свои новые границы. Не противься. Дыши глубже. Познавай".

"For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы случилось сплетение, надо расширить сознание, видеть больше, слышать неслышимое. Следующие Завету Паутины воскуривают сакральные эссенции, и твое тело непривычно к ним, Домин'{name}. Разум пытается осознать свои новые границы. Не противься. Дыши глубже. Познавай".

traits.locale_text: "For Tue'ri to happen, You have to expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who walk the path of the Ann'shini burn sacred essences, and your body is not accustomed to them, Enim'{name}. The mind is trying to grasp its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

"For Tue'ri to happen, You have to expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who walk the path of the Ann'shini burn sacred essences, and your body is not accustomed to them, Enim'{name}. The mind is trying to grasp its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

"For Tue'ri to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who walk the path of the Ann'shini often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Enim'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist, but rather, breathe deeply. Learn."

Do not resist, but rather, breathe deeply. Learn."

Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

"For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

languages.text: "Um die Verschlingung zu ermöglichen, müsst Ihr zunächst Euren Geist erweitern, um das Ungesehene zu sehen und das Ungehörte zu hören. Wer nach den Grundsätzen des Netzes lebt und stirbt, verbrennt häufig heilige Essenzen, und Euer Körper ist daran noch nicht gewöhnt, Domin'{name}. Euer Geist versucht, seine neuen Grenzen zu erfassen. Wehrt Euch nicht dagegen. Atmet tief durch. Lernt."
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

traits.locale_text: "Um die Verschlingung zu ermöglichen, müsst Ihr zunächst Euren Geist erweitern, um das Ungesehene zu sehen und das Ungehörte zu hören. Wer nach den Grundsätzen des Netzes lebt und stirbt, verbrennt häufig heilige Essenzen, und Euer Körper ist daran noch nicht gewöhnt, Domin'{name}. Euer Geist versucht, seine neuen Grenzen zu erfassen. Wehrt Euch nicht dagegen. Atmet tief durch. Lernt."

languages.text: «Para que se produzca el entrelazamiento, antes debe expandir su mente, ver lo invisible, oír lo inaudible. Quienes viven y mueren por la Doctrina de la Red suelen quemar esencias sagradas, y su cuerpo aún no está acostumbrado a ellas, Domin'{name}. Su mente intenta comprender sus nuevos límites. No se resista. Respire hondo. Aprenda».
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

traits.locale_text: «Para que se produzca el entrelazamiento, antes debe expandir su mente, ver lo invisible, oír lo inaudible. Quienes viven y mueren por la Doctrina de la Red suelen quemar esencias sagradas, y su cuerpo aún no está acostumbrado a ellas, Domin'{name}. Su mente intenta comprender sus nuevos límites. No se resista. Respire hondo. Aprenda».

languages.text: 「結びつけを起こすには、まずは心を広げて、見えないものを見て、聞こえないものを聞かなければならない。ウェブの教義に従って生き、従って死ぬ者は時折、神聖なエッセンスを燃やすが、あなたの身体はまだそれに慣れていない、ドミン・{name}。あなたの心は新たな境界を掴もうとしている。抗わなくていい。深呼吸して。学ぶのよ」
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

traits.locale_text: 「結びつけを起こすには、まずは心を広げて、見えないものを見て、聞こえないものを聞かなければならない。ウェブの教義に従って生き、従って死ぬ者は時折、神聖なエッセンスを燃やすが、あなたの身体はまだそれに慣れていない、ドミン・{name}。あなたの心は新たな境界を掴もうとしている。抗わなくていい。深呼吸して。学ぶのよ」

languages.text: “为了举行盘绕祭礼，你必须先拓宽思维，看到目不可见之物，听到耳不可闻之声。追随教义的信徒常常会焚烧神圣精华，但你的身体尚未习惯它的味道，秘者{name}。此刻，你的思维正在努力开拓新的领域。不要抗拒，大口呼吸，学习这一切。”
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

traits.locale_text: “为了举行盘绕祭礼，你必须先拓宽思维，看到目不可见之物，听到耳不可闻之声。追随教义的信徒常常会焚烧神圣精华，但你的身体尚未习惯它的味道，秘者{name}。此刻，你的思维正在努力开拓新的领域。不要抗拒，大口呼吸，学习这一切。”

languages.text: « Pour que le jumelage puisse s'accomplir, vous devez d'abord ouvrir votre esprit, voir l'invisible, entendre l'inaudible. Ceux qui suivent les Préceptes de la Toile font souvent brûler des essences sacrées et votre corps n'est pas encore accoutumé à elles, Domin'{name}. Votre esprit tente de saisir ses nouvelles frontières. Ne résistez pas. Inspirez profondément. Apprenez. »
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."

traits.locale_text: « Pour que le jumelage puisse s'accomplir, vous devez d'abord ouvrir votre esprit, voir l'invisible, entendre l'inaudible. Ceux qui suivent les Préceptes de la Toile font souvent brûler des essences sacrées et votre corps n'est pas encore accoutumé à elles, Domin'{name}. Votre esprit tente de saisir ses nouvelles frontières. Ne résistez pas. Inspirez profondément. Apprenez. »

languages.text: "Bükümün gerçekleşmesi için ilk önce zihnini genişleterek görünmeyeni görmen, duyulmayanı duyman gerek. Ağ'ın İlkeleri'yle yaşayıp ölenler, sıklıkla kutsal esanslar yakar. Senin bedenin ise onlara henüz alışkın değil Domin'{name}. Zihnin, yeni sınırlarını kavramaya uğraşıyor. Karşı koyma. Derin derin nefes al ve öğren."
languages.original_text: "For the twining to happen, you must first expand your mind, see the unseen, hear the unheard. Those who live and die by the Tenets of the Web often burn sacred essences, and your body is not yet accustomed to them, Domin'{name}. Your mind is trying to grasp at its new boundaries. Do not resist. Breathe deeply. Learn."
